articles.title: Southern California fire burns mobile homes, Malibu mansions
articles.description: A wildfire burned through scores of homes in Southern California. The fire scorched more than 70,000 acres. Jamie Yuccas reports.

articles.title: "CBS Weekend News" headlines for Saturday, November 10th, 2018
articles.description: Here's a look at the top stories making headlines on the "CBS Weekend News" with DeMarco Morgan.

articles.author: CBS News
articles.title: A World War II veteran's memories of a shot fired
articles.description: Clarence Smoyer, a gunner with the U.S. Army's 3rd Armored Division, cannot forget his fateful tank battle in Cologne, Germany, and a young girl caught in the crossfire
articles.content: This 94-year-old's journey from Pennsylvania all the way to a tiny grave in Cologne, Germany, is deeply personal. "I'm sorry Katharina. I never forget you," whispered Clarence Smoyer. He never met Katharina Esser. Yet, always feared her death might be his fau… [+4893 chars]

articles.title: Trump faces criticism over canceled cemetery vist in France
articles.description: His visit to Aisne-Marne American Cemetery at Belleau Wood was canceled by White House over bad weather
articles.content: President Trump is receiving some criticism on social media for not finding a way to visit a cemetery in France for Americans killed in World War I. Mr. Trump was to visit the the Aisne-Marne American Cemetery at Belleau Wood on Saturday, but the White House … [+1443 chars]

articles.content: McLEAN, Va. -- Police have arrested a woman and charged her with the 2017 deaths of her sister and mother and staging the crime scene to look like a murder-suicide. When 23-year-old Helen Hargan and her mother, 63-year-old Pamela Hargan, were found dead in a … [+993 chars]

articles.title: Ben Stiller on directing the prison-break drama "Escape at Dannemora"
articles.description: The star of comedy franchises, known for slapstick and gross-out humor, goes behind the camera for a miniseries based on a pair of convicted murderers' brazen escape from an upstate N.Y. maximum security prison
articles.content: In June 2015, a pair of convicted killers vanished from their cells inside a maximum security prison in upstate New York. It seemed only a matter of time before their brazen escape, and the 23-day manhunt that followed, got its Hollywood close-up. What might … [+5861 chars]

articles.description: Jimmy Butler is being traded to the 76ers in a package that will send Dario Saric and Robert Covington to the Timberwolves, sources say
articles.content: Jimmy Butler has his wish: He's out of Minnesota. And just like that, Philadelphia has a new Big Three - one that could make serious noise in the Eastern Conference. A person with knowledge of the situation said Saturday that Butler is being traded to the 76e… [+5275 chars]

articles.description: Election day was another test for Facebook when it comes to the spread of propaganda. The company says a team of experts worked around the clock on the issue but critics say more needs to be done to prevent the spread of misinformation. Jennifer Grygiel, assi…

articles.title: The law Tim Cook wants in the U.S. to protect data
articles.description: A European law gives users the right to control the data they give to tech companies. "60 Minutes" reports, Sunday at 7:30 p.m. ET and 7 p.m. PT on CBS.
articles.content: This has not been a great year for big tech; on Wall Street or in Washington. For decades, companies like Google, Facebook, and Amazon have made vast sums monetizing the personal information of their users with almost no oversight or regulation. They are stil… [+13221 chars]
